tyxonq.core.operations#

Classes

GateSpec(name, num_qubits[, generator, ...])

Metadata describing a gate/operator.

Operation(name, wires[, params])

A placed operation referring to a gate by name on specific wires.
class tyxonq.core.operations.GateSpec(name, num_qubits, generator=None, differentiable=True, num_params=0, is_shiftable=False, shift_coeffs=None, gradient_method=None)[source]#

Bases: object

Metadata describing a gate/operator.

Fields:

name: Canonical gate name (e.g., “h”, “cx”). num_qubits: Arity of the operation. generator: Optional generator information for gradients. differentiable: Whether parameterized variants are differentiable.

num_qubits: int#

A placed operation referring to a gate by name on specific wires.

__init__(name, wires, params=())#
tyxonq.core.operations.get_unitary(name, *params)[source]#

Return the unitary matrix for a supported gate.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Gate name. Supported: “h”, “rz”, “cx”.

  • *params (float) – Gate parameters. For “rz”, expects one angle theta.

Returns:

The unitary matrix with dtype=complex128.

Return type:

np.ndarray

Raises:

ValueError – If the gate is unknown or parameters are missing.
